info.institution: Laboratory of Distributed Multimedia Information Systems & Applications / Technical University of Crete (MUSIC/TUC)
info.summary:
Stavros Christodoulakis works as a Professor
Director in Laboratory of Distributed Multimedia Information Systems & Applications / Technical University of Crete (MUSIC/TUC)
, and his\her h-index is 31, g-index is 62. His\Her interests are :
 Data Management; Database Design; Linked Data; Relational Databases; Semantic Web;
